subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Though N.F.L. punters are booting the ball farther than ever, returners scored 20 touchdowns in 2011, their second-highest season total, and this year already have five.
snippet: Though N.F.L. punters are booting the ball farther than ever, returners scored 20 touchdowns in 2011, their second-highest season total, and this year already have five.
